chinese: 最典型的；起决定性作用的
example: Hard work is one of the defining qualities of a successful person.
The famous singer is an icon for many young people.
The archaeologist discovered ancient artifacts at the site.
In ancient times, some people were forced to be slaves.
The old cemetery is filled with tombstones.
The museum displays the skeleton of a dinosaur.
The emperor ruled the kingdom with great power.
The US dollar is a widely used international currency.
We should protect the earth for future generations.
The archaeologist found a valuable artefact in the ruins.
The ancient tomb was filled with treasures.
The brave warrior fought in many battles.
The meeting will last for two hours.
She has a quick mind and solves problems fast.
The traffic is slow during rush hour.
Regular exercise can increase your strength and stamina.
Prices of houses tend to go up in this area.
Despite changes, some things stay the same.
Leaves fall from trees in autumn. / The temperature will fall tonight.
The sun rises in the east. / Prices rise during inflation.
Plants grow towards the sunlight. / Her interest in art has grown over time.
The sun goes down in the sun goes down in the west. / Temperatures go down at night.
They climb the mountain every summer. / The price of oil is climbing.
Eating less junk food can decrease your risk of illness.
Don’t drop the glass! / The number of students has dropped this year.
The company’s profits are in decline. / She declined the invitation politely.
The city has seen rapid development in recent years.
He has a steady job and income. / The boat sailed at a steady pace.
There is a slight chance of rain tomorrow. / She has a slight cold.
